pkgmetadata.longdescription: ======Atomic======An atomic class that guarantees atomic updates to its contained value. :: from atomic import AtomicLong atomic = AtomicLong(0) atomic += 1 atomic.valueInstallation============To install atomic, use pip : :: pip install atomicAcknowledgement===============This is heavily inspired by `ruby-atomic <https://github.com/headius/ruby-atomic>`_.
